SEARCH
Package Graph

Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
Graph.Vertex
public class Vertex extends Object
Represents a vertex (node) in a graph, typically corresponding to a region in an image. Each vertex stores its position, features, edges to connected vertices, and obstacle status.

    • Vertex

      public Vertex(String id, int x, int y)
      Constructs a new Vertex with the specified ID and coordinates.
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the vertex
      x - X-coordinate of the vertex in the image
      y - Y-coordinate of the vertex in the image

  • Method Details

    • addEdge

      public void addEdge(Vertex destination, double weight)
      Adds an edge from this vertex to the destination vertex with the given weight.
      Parameters:
      destination - The vertex to connect to
      weight - The weight/cost of the edge

    • removeEdge

      public void removeEdge(Vertex destination)
      Removes all edges from this vertex to the specified destination vertex.
      Parameters:
      destination - The vertex to disconnect from

    • isObstacle

      public boolean isObstacle()
      Returns:
      true if this vertex represents an obstacle, false otherwise

    • setObstacle

      public void setObstacle(boolean obstacle)
      Sets whether this vertex represents an obstacle.
      Parameters:
      obstacle - true to mark as obstacle, false otherwise

    • isVisited

      public boolean isVisited()
      Returns:
      true if this vertex has been visited during pathfinding

    • setVisited

      public void setVisited(boolean visited)
      Sets the visited status of this vertex.
      Parameters:
      visited - true to mark as visited, false otherwise

      Calculates the Euclidean distance to another vertex.
      Parameters:
      other - The other vertex
      Returns:
      The distance between this vertex and the other vertex

    • featureDistance

      public double featureDistance(Vertex other)
      Calculates the feature distance (Euclidean distance between feature vectors) to another vertex.
      Parameters:
      other - The other vertex
      Returns:
      The feature distance between vertices
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If feature vectors are not set or have different lengths
